H0.text: who sings the original windmills of your mind. Dusty Springfield

H1.text: who sings the original windmills of your mind. Engelbert Humperdinck

H2.text: who sings the original windmills of your mind. Petula Clark

H3.text: who sings the original windmills of your mind. Noel Harrison

A4.text: The Windmills of Your Mind, the theme tune from the film The Thomas Crown Affair, was recorded by Harrison.

A5.text: In 1968, Harrison had a top-10 hit in the UK Singles Chart with The Windmills of Your Mind.
